content.question: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 2, of, the fraction with numerator x squared, minus 4, and denominator x squared, minus 5 x, plus 6, end fraction " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></munder><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> is

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
